question: If the mean of five numbers is 12, and three of the numbers are 6, 8, and 10, what is the sum of the other two numbers?
In a triangle, the ratio of the lengths of the sides opposite to the angles is 2:3:5. If the smallest side is 8 cm long, what is the length of the hypotenuse?
A cylindrical well of radius 4.5 m has a depth of 7 m. What is its curved surface area?
A water tank can hold 2400 litres of water. The capacity of a tap is 10 litres per minute. If the tank is already 1/3 full, how much time will it take to fill the tank?
A circle is inscribed in an equilateral triangle with each side measuring 10 cm. What is the radius of the circle?
